products.title: Utopia Charcoal Roller Blind
products.metadescription: If you thought youd seen all of the grey blinds, you be wrong. This utopia charcoal roller blind is like no other. Its sleek, but with a look of sweet texture, dark but with a whole lot of warmth.    Plus, with the light filtering fabric, it gentle diffuses the suns harsh gla

products.title: Utopia Slate Grey Roller Blind

products.title: Utopia Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Dark and contemporary, this utopia charcoal vertical blind is a wonderful addition to their tuiss collection, so sleek, so elegant.
